name: MewMew Tower Toy for iPad
description:
LIMITED TIME SALE!!!
---------------------------------
iPhone favorite “Mew Mew Tower” is back but this time the cats are REAL! Enjoy “MewMew Tower TOY”, the live-action version of MewMew Tower for the iPad. Also with 2-Player simultaneous mode!


MewMew Tower TOY was created based on the Original MewMew Tower, with the added space and beauty of the iPad screen. A GREAT first iPad app!

- MewMew Tower Basic Rules - *You can only stack cats in a vertical column. *Once you’ve stacked a cat, you cannot move it. Just keep on stackin’ em even if you slip up! *Cats come in 3 sizes Small, Medium, and Large. *Its important to tilt the device to maintain balance. Careful not to overtilt!


Now 2 people can play! This is BIG. 2-Player simultaneous mode = Super fun! *Remember, you cannot tilt for balance in 2-Player mode! Imagine two players trying to tilt the same iPad at the same time -- Hehehe.

It may seem easy but you'll need expert balancing skills and a little bit of luck to set a good record. Play with the whole family!
